jd: From: shubham, Spearstaffing shubham@spearstaffing.com Reply to: shubham@spearstaffing.com Job Title - Azure Data EngineerLocation: Middlesex County, Central Jersey (Hybrid) Experience: 10+YearsEnd Client: Morgan StanleyVISA : USC GC only Rate: $65/hr on c2c MCSA Cloud Platform Azure Training Certification MCSE Cloud Platform Infrastructure Certification is a MUST for this role (Cert ID / Link is required) Job Summary:We are seeking an experienced Azure Data Solutions EngineerIf you are data freak and looking for a professionally challenging and financially rewarding career this position might be of interest to you.
